statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); pdir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); if [ "$dir" = "$pdir" ]; then dname=$(basename "$dir"); else dname="$(basename "$pdir")/${dir#$pdir/}"; fi; cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null; branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); gstat=""; git diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || gstat="${gstat}â—"; [ -n "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard 2>/dev/null)" ] && gstat="${gstat}+"; [ -n "$branch" ] && ginfo=" ${branch}${gstat:+ $gstat}" || ginfo=""; printf "\033[48;5;232m\033[38;5;255m  \033[0m\033[48;5;4m\033[38;5;254m %s \033[0m" "$dname"; [ -n "$ginfo" ] && printf "\033[48;5;2m\033[38;5;0m%s \033[0m" "$ginfo"; printf " \033[2m|\033[0m \033[48;5;5m\033[38;5;255m %s \033[0m \033[2m|\033[0m \033[48;5;3m\033[38;5;0m %s \033[0m" "$model" "$style"
